text: remember the game that Joaquin Phoenix played in _Her_? The guy who made it recently released his latest game on Steam. In it, you manage (?) a mountain! <http://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2014/08/19/mountain-released-steam/>

attachments.text: I think about my Mountain often, though I haven't visited it since July. The time we spent with our virtual pet rocks was wonderful, but as my mountain
attachments.fallback: I think about my Mountain often, though I haven't visited it since July. The time we spent with our virtual pet rocks was wonderful, but as my mountain

text: Mountain! I was intrigued by the premise, mostly from reading about Ian Bogost's thoughts after playing it. It's either a huge waste of time...or an extremely well made look at what it does, in fact, mean to feel like a mountain.

attachments.title: You Are Mountain
attachments.text: A strange video game from the Her animator bests Spike Jonze's film at depicting what a relationship with an alien really would be like.
